events.text:
I knew I could count on you, VC.
We thought we'd never get out bodies back!
Ignore [color=#00b1ff]Moose's[/color] angst... this whole ordeal has been very hard on his feeble mind.

events.question: Are you going to stay and help us rebuild this place?

events.text:
A mystery that has evaded you for some time now, huh?
I'll do my best to tell you everything.
Just after dusk, Niki and Moose went searching for you in the old dumping grounds.
In that hole in the ground they discovered a host of giant, shrieking [color=#9effef]spiders[/color] with human heads!
We took off as fast as we could in the RV... but you know how Niki is...

Ah yes, the poor little lad... you haven't seen him either?
Niki outright refused to join us in the RV and went into hiding when we were trying to leave.
He probably found Maldoror and hid in the abandoned factory.
We promise we didn't MEAN to leave him for dead! I know how close you two are...
As a Circle my aim was to "laugh in the face of tyranny and the inevitable collapse of civilization".
Turns out we didn't know anything! I don't blame you if you don't want to be a part of this Family anymore...
